what.description: This activity provides a comprehensive bug report, enabling you to make informed decisions quickly about your product's functionality.
what.goal: By accessing your dedicated dashboard, you can immediately start prioritizing fixes based on severity, integrate findings with your tracking systems, and keep your development timeline on track - all for a streamlined investment of €2000.

reasons.description: and quickly verify that your digital product is working properly with full validation. You define the timing and duration of the activity to receive the first bugs.
